import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useParams, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Movie = (props) => { const { id } = useParams(); const { push } = useHistory(); const movies = useSelector((store) => store.movies); const movie = movies.find((movie) => movie.id === Number(id)); return (

{movie.title} Detayları

İsim
{movie.title}
Yönetmen
{movie.director}
Tür
{movie.genre}
Metascore
{movie.metascore}
Açıklama

{movie.description}

); }; export default Movie;
